channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Button Generator

item.title: CVE-2024-3471|2024-06-04T17:32:08.568Z -- unknown -- button%20generator
item.description: The Button Generator WordPress plugin before 3.0 does not have CSRF check in place when bulk deleting, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin delete buttons via a CSRF attack
